title: Digital Textbook Development Course Utilizing Metasystem Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and foundational knowledge in social sciences
context.additional_context: A course designed to enhance digital textbook design competencies in the social sciences domain for current practitioners, utilizing flexible learning environments with personal mobile devices

learning_goals: Can apply five user interface design principles for digital textbooks to create prototypes
Can select and implement three types of data visualization techniques suitable for social studies content characteristics
Can analyze and design learner-content-environment interaction structures using a meta-system approach
Can develop three effectiveness measurement indicators for digital textbook usage utilizing formative assessment tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
